english.segment1: Lord Im needing you now . More than ever before . Im asking you to give me some strength . For Lord I need it to go on . With all that you need me to do . Im just asking you Lord just please do what you do . . Im just tryin to do what you want me to do . Im just tryin to do what you want me to do . Im just tryin to do what you want me to do . Im just tryin . Lord Im tryin . . Lord help me keep my mind straight . So I can keep it on you . I dont need any disturbance . To get between me and you . So Lord please send your angels . To help us better serve you . To serve you . . Im just tryin to do what you want me to do . Im just tryin to do what you want me to do . Im just tryin to do what you want me to do . Im just tryin . Lord Im tryin . . Im just tryin to do what you want me to do . Im just tryin to do what you want me to do . Im just tryin to do what you want me to do . Im just tryin . Im just tryin . Lord Im tryin
